description: This Python source file defines a class `GoogleSheetsTools` that provides tools for interacting with the Google Sheets API, including reading, creating, updating, and duplicating spreadsheets. It manages OAuth2 authentication, handles external dependencies, and encapsulates Google Sheets and Drive API operations.

classes.name: GoogleSheetsTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing Google Sheets API interactions, including authentication, reading, creating, updating, and duplicating spreadsheets.

methods.name: _auth
methods.description: Handles OAuth2 authentication, loading credentials from file or initiating OAuth flow.

methods.name: read_sheet
methods.description: Reads data from a specified Google Sheet and range, returning JSON-formatted data.

methods.name: create_sheet
methods.description: Creates a new Google Spreadsheet with a specified title.

methods.name: update_sheet
methods.description: Updates a specified range in a Google Sheet with provided data.

methods.name: create_duplicate_sheet
methods.description: Duplicates an existing Google Spreadsheet, optionally copying permissions, using the Drive API.
